thread.title: Hoyer, Hopkins help Texans handle Jaguars
thread.title_full: Hoyer, Hopkins help Texans handle Jaguars - San Antonio Express-News

author: mysanantonio.com
title: Hoyer, Hopkins help Texans handle Jaguars
text:
Photo: Phelan M. Ebenhack, FRE / Associated Press Image 1 of / 1 Caption
Close
Image 1 of 1 Houston Texans quarterback Brian Hoyer (7) looks for a receiver during the second half of an NFL football game against the Jacksonville Jaguars in Jacksonville, Fla., Sunday, Oct. 18, 2015. Houston won 31-20. (AP Photo/Phelan M. Ebenhack) Houston Texans quarterback Brian Hoyer (7) looks for a receiver during the second half of an NFL football game against the Jacksonville Jaguars in Jacksonville, Fla., Sunday, Oct. 18, 2015. Houston won ... more Photo: Phelan M. Ebenhack, FRE / Associated Press Hoyer, Hopkins help Texans handle Jaguars 1 / 1 Back to Gallery JACKSONVILLE, Fla. — Poised in the pocket, and precise with every throw. He even bounced back from a vicious hit.
Brian Hoyer was so good Sunday he impressed coach Bill O’Brien , something that hasn’t been easy for either of Houston’s quarterbacks this season.
Hoyer threw three touchdown passes on third down, two to rising star DeAndre Hopkins , and the Texans beat the Jacksonville Jaguars 31-20.
For more, visit ExpressNews.com
